META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - e-lēmumu pieņemšanas platforma kopienām.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS ļauj piedalīties diskusijās un balsot grupās tad, kad tikties visiem kopā vienā laikā neizdodas.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: e-lēmumu pieņemšana, e-pārvalde, e-demokrātija, demokrātija, tiešā demokrātija, plūstošā demokrātija
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_SPAM: Satur spamu vai nav saistīts ar tematu

HOME.HEADING_NO_RESUTS: We’re sorry, but we couldn’t find any results :(
HOME.HEADING_GET_STARTED: Maybe you can get the first discussion initiated by
HOME.HEADING_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: A beginner’s guide to Citizen OS.
HOME.TXT_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS! Read this topic to find out how everything works.
HOME.TXT_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Keep It Clean Plan by Let's Do It! World.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Here you can find all the documents and information on the Keep It Clean Plan.

MY.HEADING_NOT_IN_GROUP: You are not yet part of a group.
MY.HEADING_AT_LEAST_WE_HELP: At least you still have us to help you by
MY.HEADING_NOT_PARTICIPATED: You have not participated in a topic yet. Try it, it’s really cool!

PARTNERS_CONSENT.HEADING: Rahvaalgatus.ee lūdz piekļuvi sekojošiem Jūsu konta datiem:
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_PROFILE: Apskatīt un rediģēt Citizen OS profilu - vārds, uzņēmums, e-pasts, fotogrāfija.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_TOPICS: Apskatīt un rediģēt jūsu Citizen OS publiskos tematus un tematus, kas izveidoti vietnē Rahvaalgatus.ee.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_VOTES: Apskatiet un rediģējiet jūsu Citizen OS balsojumus sabiedriskos tematos un tematos, kas izveidoti vietnē Rahvaalgatus.ee.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_GROUPS: Apskatīt un rediģēt jūsu Citizen OS grupas.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_POLICY: Rahvaalgatus.ee will izmantos šo informāciju saskaņā ar atbilstošajiem pakalpojuma sniegšanas noteikumiem un privātuma politiku.

PARTNERS_LOGIN.HEADING: Rahvaalgatus.ee strādā kopā ar Citizen OS, lai nodrošinātu jums lielisku pieredzi. Ja vēlaties pilnvērtīgi izmantot šo platformu, lūdzu, please piesakieties Citizen OS vai reģistrējaties.

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_EDIT: Jūs ieslēdzāt rediģēšanas režīmu. Jūs varat pievienot vai rediģēt tekstu. Visas izmaiņas tiek saglabātas automātiski.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_VOTE: Par šo tematu ir sākta balsošana, rediģēšana vairs nav iespējama!
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: Kā šis lēmums tiek ieviests praksē?
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Lūdzu, norādiet detalizētu informāciju, saites u.tml.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: Šim balsojumam nepieciešama pieteikšanās ar ID karti vai Mobiil-ID.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: Šis dokuments ir jāparaksta ar ID kari vai Mobiil-ID. Jūs nevarat balsot, kamēr nebūsiet identificējuši sevi.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your mind and your vote by choosing another option.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: Everyone has cast their votes. You can download the full document here.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ID-CARD- OR MOBILE SIGNING IS REQUIRED
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: ALLOW USERS TO PASS ON THEIR VOTING RIGHT.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: When eID is the chosen method of voting, delegation is not allowed.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Šo argumentu par neatbilstošu atzina lietotājs {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Lasiet mūsu uzvedības kodeksu, lai uzzinātu vairāk
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Šo atbildi par neatbilstošu atzina lietotājs {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Paskaidrojiet un pierādīt savu apgalvojumu šeit...
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Atvainojamies, bet mēs nevaram parādīt pieminējumus sociālajos tīklos, jo šim tematam nav definēta mirkļbirka. Lietotāji ar atļauju rediģēt var pievienot mirkļbirkas, lai iegūtu pieminējumus sociālajos tīklos.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Atvainojamies, bet Twitter pieminējumi šai mirkļbirkai nav atrasti

MSG_ERROR_POST_API_AUTH_SIGNUP_40000_PAS: Parolei ir jābūt vismaz 6 rakstzīmes garai, jāsatur vismaz viens cipars, 1 mazais un 1 lielais burts.

MSG_ERROR_POST_API_USERS_GROUPS_40000_NA: Atļautais grupas nosaukuma garums ir no 2 līdz 255 rakstzīmēm.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_AUTH_SMARTID_INIT_400: Smart-ID autentifikācijai ir nepieciešams lietotāja PID (personas kods)
MSG_ERROR_GET_API_AUTH_MOBILE_STATUS_400: Mobiil-ID funkcija jūsu viedtālrunī vēl nav gatava. Lūdzu, mēģiniet vēlreiz. Ja problēma turpinās, lūdzu, sazinieties ar pakalpojuma sniedzēju.
Jūsu tālrunis ir izslēgts vai ārpus uztveršanas zonas.
Jūsu tālrunis nevar saņemt ziņojumus vai ziņojumu sūtīšana ir traucēta.
Tālruņa SIM kļūda. Mēģiniet vēlreiz. Ja problēma turpinās, lūdzu, sazinieties ar pakalpojuma sniedzēju.
Jūsu sertifikāts ir atcelts. Lūdzu, sazinieties ar pakalpojuma sniedzēju.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_AUTH_MOBILE_INIT_4002: Nepareizs tālruņa numurs un/vai personas kods. Tālruņa numurs ir jānorāda ar valsts kodu.
Mobiil-ID funkcionalitāte netiek atbalstīta. Lūdzu, pārbaudiet tālruņa numuru un/vai personas kodu.

Main statement can be 1 to 128 characters long.

The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
The signature is invalid. Your vote was not counted.
MSG_ERROR_GET_API_TOPICS_VOTES_STATUS_50: DigiDoc Service error. Please try again, if the problem persist contact customer support.
MSG_ERROR_POST_API_USERS_TOPICS_VOTES_40: Personal identification code (PID) is already connected to another user account. Signing votes with the same PID from different user accounts is not allowed.
Your user account is already connected to another personal identification code (PID). We don't allow voting from the same account with different PID-s.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_USER_CANCEL: You have cancelled the login flow.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_CERTIFICATES: No card in reader. Check if the ID-card is inserted correctly into the reader. New ID-cards have a chip on the back side of the card.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_IMPLEMENTATION: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit installer.id.ee website to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_TECHNICAL_ERROR: Something went wrong in our system. We're very sorry! Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_PUT_API_USERS_GROUPS_MEMBERS_U: Cannot revoke admin permissions from the last admin member in the Group. Assign new admin to change permissions of the current User.
MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_GROUPS_MEMBER: You cannot leave this Group as you are the last admin user of this Group. Please assign a new admin to leave.
MSG_ERROR_DELETE_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBER: You cannot delete the last user with admin permissions. Assign a new admin to delete the user.
MSG_ERROR_PUT_API_USERS_TOPICS_MEMBERS_U: You cannot remove admin permissions from the last admin user. Please assign admin permissions to another user to change the permissions of the current one.
MSG_ERROR_40300: You don't have permissions to complete the operation.
MSG_ERROR_50000: Something went wrong in our system. We're very sorry! Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_NETWORK_PROBLEMS: Network issues, please check your internet connection.
MSG_ERROR_ATTACHMENT_SIZE_OVER_LIMIT: Attachment is too big! Maximum allowed size is 50MB.
MSG_ERROR_PASSWORD_MISMATCH: Password does not match the confirmed password.
